website_summaries.verdict: The Casio Exilim EX-H10 is one of the most compact wide-angle megazoom cameras available, but its photos are less exciting.
pros: 10x zoom in a very compact body

customer_reviews.title: Another Casio Winner
customer_reviews.text: This is our fourth Casio and the largest so far .... but still fits in our pockets. We were both died in the wool SLR users and had Leicas, but when the first digitals started to appear we tried them out. Our first was a bulky Sony which we loved, but the first Exilim that we spied we tried and we have never gone back. This newest one seems to have the best picture quality, ease of use and a great screen. We can't wait for the next big trip to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: The Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose camera with extended zoom
customer_reviews.text: The Casio EX-H10 12MP camera is a great combination of ease of use, performance, and value. This particular model fits in a slimmer body than the high speed enthusiast series from Casio, yet offers a greater optical zoom. It is slightly larger than most other Exilim models due to the extended zoom and large 3.0" LCD display. PROS *10x optical zoom *wide angle lens *long battery life *easy point and shoot camera CONS *lightweight design uses lots of plastic *must use LCD for visual (no viewfinder) *slightly bulkier than Exilim card models Other Considerations from CASIO For more durable design: Thinner design: Advanced features:
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: one of the best  but
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera ive owned only problem is you cant take pictures of the moon. the manual controls dont as well as other casio like the ex-v7 Recommended! If anyone has any questions about this please don't be afraid to ask me. I'd be more than happy to answer any and all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Van Gogh

customer_reviews.title: Defective out the box
customer_reviews.text: This Compact digital is well designed and comfortable to use. The camera has a active video zoom and shoots an excellent HD video, However in this particular case the sound would stop recording about 10 seconds into the recording. I liked the camera and would have kept it had it not been for that out the box flaw. The picture quality had greatly improved over previous casio camera that created grainy pictures.
customer_reviews.author: AenJailies

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my fiancee, and she has liked using it. The picture quality is great for such a compact camera and the 10x zoom makes it even better. We haven't really judged battery life yet, but it seems to hold up pretty well. Only thing is, if you're going to be recording a lot of HD video, you better have a large capacity memory card.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: The best compact
customer_reviews.text: This is my second camera like this. The first one was stolen by a hotel maid. I have not found a more versatile camera. It is equally adept at video as it is at still pictures. I also like how easy it is to download the pictures and video on a computer.
customer_reviews.author: greg williams

customer_reviews.title: Say CHEESE!
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift. Person wanted a "professional" camera of high quality and special features but yet very simple to use. The 10X zoom is awesome. The 12 megapixel shots are so clear and easy to shoot you'd have to pay someone to take better pictures. And it fits in a pocket or purse.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Paratore Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying my new camera! Battery life is great and takes clear crisp pictures. It's not total pro camera, but for vacation and family outings it works excellent. After doing alot of research, this was the camera I choose and I'm very glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Evast3

customer_reviews.title: Broken too fast
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewer's cameras, mine worked for a short while, and then when I tried to turn it on, it started to "stick" as the telephoto lens tried to come out from the body of the camera. It still makes mechanical sounds, but the lens won't extend and let the camera finish turning on, so you can't even get your photos OFF the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie the Red

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and his wife for Christmas. They LOVE it. Took it on a month's vacation hiking all the National Parks in Northern California. Took 3000 pictures and only charged it once when out there. The pictures were great!
customer_reviews.author: Senior Scholar

customer_reviews.title: Casio Digital Camera EXH10
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new Casio Digital H10 Camera in May 2010. Picture quality is poor especially in rooms where there is a lot of incandescent lighting which is true of most homes and many businesses and social gathering places. This is using Casio's "Best Picture" functionality built in to the camera. The pictures come out orange and I have spent hours trying to correct them at home and at developers with limited success. Battery and /or charger went bad at first recharge. I vote no buy on this camera.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the screen in sunlight, and the zoom speed
customer_reviews.text: It is an OK camera, but almost impossible to frame a shot in even moderately bright sunlight. Guess and shoot is more like it. Also I didn't like the zoom speed. To stop the zoom anywhere between the full zoom and no zoom is extremely frustrating; the zoom motor is just too fast and there is no way to easily fine-tune where you want to stop the zoom. Otherwise the camera is good. Very portable, very good picture quality. Overall I give it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hans-Dieter Honscheid

customer_reviews.title: casio camera
customer_reviews.text: After having done much research on my next camera purchase, I read a review in Consumer Reports @ digital cameras. This camera was rated as a best buy. It had all of the features & specs of the Nikon I was looking at purchasing, but at less than half of the price. Being a believer in Consumer Reports, I purchased the Casio. I have been very pleased with the high quality of the pictures, ease of use, and excellent zoom feature. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: sean r

customer_reviews.title: Cut Above Other Point 'n Shoots
customer_reviews.text: You're going to have to get a digital SLR to get a camera with much more capability than this Casio. Candidly speaking, this camera showed up broken. I jumped through all the hoops to return it, and Amazon handled it flawlessly, though I was without the camera when I really needed it. It happens. Unlike the simpler point-and-shoots, this camera isn't that simple. Once you get the hang of it, though, it's fast, powerful, and takes great pictures. But, if you want a total point-and-shoot, and you really don't want to figure out anything, then get a simpler, and cheaper, one, though I think the $$ value of this camera is pretty dang good!
customer_reviews.author: Hondo

customer_reviews.title: It works for my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for as an amateur photographer. It's just a litle heavier because of the 10X Optical zoom, but over all I am very happy withis camera. It takes pictues fast, the battery lasts very long and there are many functions that you could play with.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber mom

customer_reviews.title: Casio EX-H10
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera with zoom and wide angle capability. Photo quality is very good. I would purchase this camera again. Casio is good choice for a point and soot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Adelbert Basa

customer_reviews.title: Casio EX-H10
customer_reviews.text: so far a great camera for the price! for a point and shoot it takes a great picture, the speed is pretty good, and the battery life is phenomenal! I was looking for a combination of 10X zoom but also compact enough to carry in my pocket. I paid $150 and feel like I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: s1

customer_reviews.title: Casio HD-EX10
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera with exceptionally good video quality. Have taken several videos of my son playing his piano and posted them on Facebook. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: IanT

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a long time, much loved digital camera, but I don't miss the old one at all. The zoom on this is incredible and the camera very intuitive to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zoom zoom zoom!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Casio Exilim for a few years. Love it and carry it with me all the time. I was planning to purchase a SLR camera. But, I knew the size would limit how often I carried it. This camera offers the best of both worlds. I love it. It seems to perform very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: D. Handy

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera yesterday and am satisfied after taking few shots. Pros: Good battery life, Good in low light, Quality pictures Cons: Tricky taking pictures after complete zoom I haven't yet tried shooting a video and not sure how does it perform. Overall, good for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Ragz

customer_reviews.title: amazing images
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5Mp Casio Exlim camera for ages and my husband gave this 12Mp. It is a wonderful camera. easy of use and the wide angle is perfect. I am really enjoying mine. It is a great cost-bennefit. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Thais Waisman

customer_reviews.title: No viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the camera despite knowing it did not have a viewfinder because of its other attributes. This was a mistake as in some light conditions you see your own reflection rather than the subject. I was unable to find a way of dealing with this problem and have written to Casio. So, the camera is very good, especially the anti-shake control and the ease at using various settings, the caveat is the lack of a viewfinder.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Golden

customer_reviews.title: casio ex h10
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I got a good deal on this camera. This was the first digital camera I have purchased and I like it. There are far more features than I will ever figure out how to use but overall it's fairly simple to use out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Casio EX-H10
customer_reviews.text: Good wide angle and excellent zoom. Very easy to use. I was especially impressed with the picture quality at low light levels. Very little noise and good resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, Quality Pictures
customer_reviews.text: The Casio Exilim Ex H10 is a great camera for zooming and takes quality pictures for a compact camera. I would highly recommend for someone who wants Digital SLR quality without all the bulk and fuss. Very small and portable and takes great holiday snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rp Green

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: It is not the best camera out there. The displayis very hard to see in bright sunlight, but it was reasonably priced and serves my purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kreitzberg

customer_reviews.title: only worked for 28 day's
customer_reviews.text: Not high on my list. Camera quit within 28 day's of use and I find out it will not only cost me to send back but could cost anywhere from $38 to $299 to fix. Kinda odd since the camera did not cost that much to begin with. Not a good investment
customer_reviews.author: Chauntel Enzweiler

customer_reviews.title: Exelente Camara
customer_reviews.text: Small camara, excelent picture quality, easy menu, waht elese can you ask for? The only con , would be that, its a little bit noisy on the zoom but other than that , its an excelent choise.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: I took hundreds of photos with this DC. They are pretty. I'm really satisfied. For family use it's good enough. (And it's cheap.)
customer_reviews.author: Hydro

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: I recently visited an exhibition, where some rooms have been quite dark and the use of flash was not allowed. But the camera adjusted the brightness automatically and even recognized the macro mode by itself. The pictures turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Franz

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. Very compact with lots of features. The camera arrived without the USB cable but the vendor has pledged to sent the missing part.
customer_reviews.author: dancer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality poor- screen cannot be seen in bright light- auto focus slow- reads "busy"after photos due to slow storage to memory card- wish i bought a canon SX90.
customer_reviews.author: khgeiger

customer_reviews.title: GOT A USED PRODUCT FOR NEW
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT MAKES AN IRRITATING NOISE WHEN YOU WANT TO TAKE A PICTURE AND MORE SO, WHEN SET TO AF, FACE RECOGNITION ETC. IT IS VERY ANNOYING, THAT MOST TIMES I DONT GO OUT WITH IT, IT IS SIMPLY AN EMBARRASSMENT. DID NOT GET WHAT I PAID FOR. CASIO IS A GOOD PRODUCT, I'VE USED ONE BEFORE. THE PROBLEM IS THAT THIS ONE WAS FAULTY BEFORE 'PORTABLE GUY' SOLD IT TO ME.
customer_reviews.author: ALVIN

product_meta.title: Casio EX-H10 12Mp Digital Camera with 10X Optical Zoom and 3.0 Inch LCD
product_meta.description: With a thin, compact body, an ultra-wide angle 24mm, 10x optical zoom lens and Dynamic Photo functionality this new model can take up to 1,000 shots on a single battery charge -- making it the perfect travel companion.
feature_bullets: Thanks to the high-speed image processing capability of the new engine, a moving subject can be cut out of a number of images
The Freedom of Zoom Photography: An ultra-wide angle 24 mm lens is useful for shooting in a small room or for photographing large subjects
10x zoom combines with a CMOS shift stabilization for beautiful images even at high zoom factors where images are prone to blurring.
HD Movie Function: Just by pressing the dedicated movie button, these cameras will record beautiful HD movies at a size of 1280x720 pixels.
In addition to recognizing faces and adjusting focus and exposure accordingly, these cameras can make adjustments to smooth skin in images

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars78 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
